Title: Relates to increasing penalties for assault, obstruction and harassment of an election officer
Summary: Includes within the class D felony of assault in the second degree, the intentional causing of physical injury to an election officer while such person is performing their assigned duties; amends aggravated harassment and obstruction of governmental administration to include election officers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to increasing penalties for assault, obstruction and harassment of election officers
